nodes.text: Arhul Hextrophon was a human male who served as a major in the military of the Alliance to Restore the Republic around the time of the Battle of Scarif. He and Lieutenant Voren Na'al worked on a book titled Official History of the Rebel Movements, Volume One, and he created a collection of files of historical importance. Immediately after the Alliance's victory over the Galactic Empire at Yavin, Hextrophon attended the ceremony held in honor of Luke Skywalker and the other heroes who helped destroy the Death Star. During the ceremony, he presented a Medal of Bravery to General Jan Dodonna before it was awarded to Han Solo by Princess Leia Organa of Alderaan.
By the time of the New Republic, a school of embedded journalism  on Lerct was named after him.
